name: A. Bulbs
statement:
Vasya wants to turn on Christmas lights consisting of bulbs. Initially,
all bulbs are turned off. There are buttons, each of them is connected
to some set of bulbs. Vasya can press any of these buttons. When the
button is pressed, it turns on all the bulbs it’s connected to. Can
Vasya light up all the bulbs?If Vasya presses the button such that some
bulbs connected to it are already turned on, they do not change their
state, i.e. remain turned on.
